import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const EditKlient = () => { const [data,setData]=useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', address:'', image:'' }) const navigate=useNavigate(); useEffect(()=>{ const {id}=useParams(); axios.get('http://localhost:8081/') .then },[]) return (

Update

setData({...data, name: e.target.value})} value={data.name}/>
setData({...data, email: e.target.value})} value={data.email}/>
setData({...data, address: e.target.value})} value={data.address}/>
) } export default EditKlient
